name: Aurastone Hammer
rules: 2, [Exhaust] -> Put target ally from your party into its owner's hand. Use only on your turn.

name: Azuresong Mageblade
rules: When you draw a card, put a verse counter on Azuresong Mageblade.; 1, Remove three verse counters -> Draw a card.

name: Band of Sulfuras
rules: If a friendly hero or ally would deal damage to an Elemental, it deals that much damage +1 instead.

name: Benediction
rules: When your hero heals damage with an ability, draw a card.; Exhaust your hero -> Put a card named Anathema from your graveyard into play.
flavour: Behind every shadow is the light of hope.

name: Blastershot Launcher
rules: When you strike with Blastershot Launcher, your hero has Long-Range this combat.; Hunter: When Blastershot Launcher enters play, your hero deals 3 ranged damage to target hero or ally.

name: Bloodfang Pants
rules: When you play a Rogue ability, you may pay 1.; If you do, your hero deals 1 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.

name: Bonereaver's Edge
rules: When Bonereaver's Edge enters play, you may destroy target armor.
flavour: It cuts through leather and leg alike.

name: Brutality Blade
rules: Destroy Brutality Blade -> Opposing heroes and allies can't be healed this turn.

name: Core Hound Tooth
rules: At the start of your turn, put a +1 ATK counter on Core Hound Tooth.; When your hero deals combat damage with Core Hound Tooth, remove all +1 ATK counters from Core Hound Tooth.

name: Dragonstalker's Legguards
rules: When you play a Hunter ability, you may pay 1.; If you do, target Ranged weapon has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Drillborer Disk
rules: When Drillborer Disk prevents damage, your hero deals 1 arcane damage to the source of that damage.

name: Eskhandar's Right Claw
rules: You may remove an equipment card in your hand from the game rather than pay Eskhandar's Right Claw's cost.
flavour: The spirit of Eskhandar lives within this beastly looking weapon.

name: Finkle's Lava Dredger
rules: At the end of your turn, if an opponent has more resources than you, you may put the top card of your deck into your resource row face down and exhausted.
flavour: Property of Finkle Einhorn, Grandmaster Adventurer.

name: Gutgore Ripper
rules: When you strike with Gutgore Ripper, target opposing ally has -1 health this turn.
flavour: The dagger's blade pulses with a dark and sinister magic.

name: Judgement Legplates
rules: When you play a Paladin ability, you may pay 1.; If you do, prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target friendly ally this turn.

name: Leggings of Transcendence
rules: When you play a Priest ability, you may pay 1.; If you do, your hero heals 2 damage from each friendly ally.

name: Legplates of Ten Storms
rules: When you play a Shaman ability, you may pay 1.; If you do, your hero deals 2 nature damage divided as you choose to up to two target heroes and/or allies.

name: Legplates of Wrath
rules: When you play a Warrior ability, you may pay 1.; If you do, ready target armor.

name: Nemesis Leggings
rules: When you play a Warlock ability, you may pay 1.; If you do, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to target opposing hero for each ability attached to that hero.

name: Netherwind Pants
rules: When you play a Mage ability, you may pay 1.; If you do, you and target opponent each draw a card.

name: Obsidian Edged Blade
rules: 1, Discard Obsidian Edged Blade from your hand -> Put a +1 ATK counter on target Two-Handed Sword.

name: Perdition's Blade
rules: When Perdition's Blade enters play, your hero deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.

name: Rhok'delar, Longbow of the Ancient Keepers
rules: When you strike with Rhok'delar, your hero has Long-Range this combat.

name: Shadowstrike
rules: 1, Destroy Shadowstrike -> If your hero has Enchanting, draw two cards.
flavour: The mystical polearm can transform into Thunderstrike. It can also be disenchanted into a nexus crystal, which some argue may be of more use.

name: Shard of the Flame
rules: When a resource enters play under your control, your hero heals 2 damage from itself.

name: Spinal Reaper
rules: When your hero deals fatal combat damage with Spinal Reaper, draw a card.
flavour: The blood of the fallen feeds the wielder of this great axe.

name: Stormrage Legguards
rules: When you play a Druid ability, you may pay 1.; If you do, target ally has +1 ATK this turn.

name: Striker's Mark
rules: Your Melee weapons have +1 ATK.; When you strike with Striker's Mark, your hero has Long-Range this combat.
flavour: Found in the treasure trove of the great core hound Magmadar, this bow is prized by more than just hunters.

name: Sulfuras, Hand of Ragnaros
rules: When your hero is dealt combat damage, it deals 1 fire damage to the source of that damage.; When you strike with Sulfuras, your hero deals 7 fire damage to target hero or ally.

name: Talisman of Ephemeral Power
rules: When you play an ability, you may pay 1 and put Talisman of Ephemeral Power into its owner's hand. If you do and your hero would deal damage with that ability this turn, it deals that much damage +1 instead.
